verifyUser: select id_user from security.user WHERE na_user = $1
verifyBlock: SELECT bl_user FROM security.user WHERE na_user = $1
verifyAttempts: SELECT at_user FROM security.user WHERE na_user = $1
selectPassUser: SELECT pw_user FROM security.user WHERE na_user = $1
restoreIntentos: UPDATE security.user SET at_user = 3 WHERE na_user = $1
disminuirIntentos: UPDATE security.user SET at_user = at_user - 1 WHERE na_user = $1
verifyIntentos: SELECT at_user FROM security.user WHERE na_user = $1
bloquear: UPDATE security.user SET bl_user = true, at_user = 0 WHERE na_user = $1
getDataSession: SELECT uw.id_user, uw.na_user, uw.em_user FROM security.user uw WHERE uw.na_user = $1
obtenerPermisos: SELECT p.na_profile profile, m.na_method method, o.de_object object, a.de_area area FROM permission pe INNER JOIN profile p ON p.id_profile = pe.id_profile INNER JOIN method m ON m.id_method = pe.id_method INNER JOIN object o ON o.id_object = m.id_object INNER JOIN area a ON a.id_area = o.id_area
addUser: INSERT INTO user_web (na_user, pa_user_web, em_user_web) VALUES ($1, $2, $3) RETURNING id_user_web
seeUser: SELECT na_user as user, em_user_web as email FROM security.user WHERE na_user = $1
verifyMethod: SELECT m.id_method, m.na_method FROM method m INNER JOIN object o ON m.id_object = o.id_object INNER JOIN area a ON a.id_area = o.id_area WHERE a.de_area = $1 AND o.de_object = $2 AND m.na_method = $3
verifyProfile: SELECT id_profile FROM profile WHERE na_profile = $1
removePermission: DELETE from permission WHERE id_method = $1 AND id_profile = $2
getProfiles: SELECT p.na_profile FROM user_profile up INNER JOIN user_web uw ON uw.id_user_web = up.id_user_web INNER JOIN profile p ON p.id_profile = up.id_profile WHERE uw.na_user = $1
hasProfile: SELECT p.id_profile FROM user_profile up INNER JOIN user_web uw ON uw.id_user_web = up.id_user_web INNER JOIN profile p ON p.id_profile = up.id_profile WHERE uw.na_user = $1 AND p.na_profile = $2
setProfileUser: INSERT INTO user_profile (id_user_web, id_profile) VALUES ((SELECT id_user_web FROM user_web WHERE na_user = $1),(SELECT id_profile FROM profile WHERE na_profile = $2))
setQuestionUser: INSERT INTO question (de_question, an_question, id_user_web) VALUES ($1, $2, (SELECT id_user_web FROM user_web WHERE na_user = $3))
cargarTodasPreguntas: SELECT id_question idQuestion,de_question question FROM question q INNER JOIN user_web uw ON uw.id_user_web = q.id_user_web WHERE uw.na_user = $1
obtenerDosRespuestas: SELECT an_question answer FROM question WHERE id_question IN ($1,$2)
updatePassword: UPDATE user_web SET pa_user_web = $1 WHERE na_user = $2
getMail: SELECT em_user_web FROM user_web WHERE na_user = $1
desbloquear: UPDATE user_web SET bl_user_web = false, at_user = 3 WHERE na_user = $1
